articles.content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk have a long history of trolling each other, particularly about the space business. According to an investor lawsuit filed a few months ago, the bill… [+2934 chars]

articles.author: Lakshmi Varanasi
articles.title: Amazon AI chatbot, Q, might be in the throes of a mental health crisis - Business Insider
articles.description: Amazon employees say Amazon's new AI chatbot for workers, called Q, is leaking information and hallucinating.
articles.content:
Amazon's Q
, the AI chatbot for workers its cloud division unveiled on Tuesday, appears to have a few issues.
